metadata.title: CVE-2017-11755 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The WritePICONImage function in coders/xpm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a craftedfile that is mishandled in an AcquireSemaphoreInfo call.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
